javaEventing
Class EventWatcher

java.lang.Object
  javaEventing.EventWatcher

public class EventWatcher
extends java.lang.Object

Helper-class for subscribing to events. Copyright 2011 Espen Skjervold, FFI

Constructor Detail

EventWatcher

public EventWatcher(EventManager.Event event)
Creates an event watcher, and registers an internal event listener for a specified event. The event watcher can later be checked to determine whether the event has been triggered or not.

Parameters:
event - An instance of the type of Event that the event watcher will subscribe to. This does not need to be the same Event instance that is used to trigger the event, it may be another instance of the same Event type (the class inheriting the Event class).

EventWatcher

public EventWatcher(EventManager.Event event,
                    EventManager.Condition condition)
Creates an event watcher, and registers an internal event listener for a specified event. The event watcher can later be checked to determine whether the event has been triggered or not.

Parameters:
event - An instance of the type of Event that the event watcher will subscribe to. This does not need to be the same Event instance that is used to trigger the event, it may be another instance of the same Event type (the class inheriting the Event class).
condition - A condition that must be true for the event watcher's internal eventListener to be called.
Method Detail

unregisterEvent

public void unregisterEvent()
Unregisters the event watchers internal event listener. Remember to call this method when finished with an event watcher object, in order to allow the garbage collector to destroy it.

hasBeenTriggered

public boolean hasBeenTriggered()
Returns true if the event has allready been triggered and the event watcher has been notified.

waitUntilTriggeredThenUnregister

public boolean waitUntilTriggeredThenUnregister(long timeout)
Blocking call. Freezes the current thread's execution, and waits until the event is triggered or the event watcher times out. When the call unblocks, the internal event listener is automatically unregistered.

Parameters:
timeout - The number of milliseconds before unblocking the call, regardless of whether or not the event is triggered. If zero, it will never time out.

waitUntilTriggered

public boolean waitUntilTriggered(long timeout)
Blocking call. Freezes the current thread's execution, and waits until the event is triggered or the event watcher times out.

Parameters:
timeout - The number of milliseconds before unblocking the call, regardless of whether or not the event is triggered. If zero, it will never time out.

reEnableEventWatcher

public void reEnableEventWatcher()
Allows re-using an event watcher object after being triggered and notified.

getEventPayload

public java.lang.Object getEventPayload()

getEvent

public EventManager.Event getEvent()
